channel.description: Recent content in publications on Fink broker

item.title: Publications
item.description: List of publications from the Fink collaboration and the larger astronomy community that uses Fink public data. 2025 Real-Time Active Learning for optimised spectroscopic follow-up: Enhancing early SN Ia classification with the Fink broker, Möller, A., Ishida, E. E. O., Peloton, J., Vidal Velázquez, O., Soon, J., Martin, B., Cluver, M., Leoni, M., Taylor, E. 2024 Search for Orphan Gamma-Ray Burst Afterglows with the Vera C. Rubin Observatory and the alert broker Fink, Marina Masson, Johan Bregeon
